categories: Category:Military personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Handro was a Human female. She served the reconstituted Sith Empire as a corporal, and sold armor to Imperials on Balmorra during the Cold War with the Galactic Republic.

Handro appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Medium Armor Vendor for Imperial players on Balmorra. With the release of Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015, she was removed from the game along with the rest of the Medium Armor Vendors.
